meanings.definition: A small monetary unit in Russia and other countries of the former Soviet Union.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny kapeek on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She saved every kapeek she earned in a jar.
meanings.sent3: The kapeek rolled away like a tiny silver wheel.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like scattering kapeeks in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The kapeek gleamed under the streetlight.
